document_data.name: ''Cloak of Guarding''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''cloak of guarding''''' was an enchanted item that protected the wearer from harm.
document_data.Description: This magical [[cloak]] appeared to be a regular heavy woolen cloak.
document_data.Powers:
When physically struck, a ''cloak of guarding'' would instantly harden at the point of contact, deflecting [[arrow]]s and other missiles, and negating some of the force of all melee weapons. The cloak would revert to its normal flexible state as soon as the strike was over. A ''cloak of guarding'' could not be harmed by any weaponry.

The cloak would also protect the wearer for a period of time if crushed on all sides. It would disintegrate into nothing when it could no longer absorb the crushing pressure.

The downside of wearing a ''cloak of guarding'' was that the wearer would experience maximum harm from any fire, cold, or electrical-based attacks.
